title: Ep211 Crematory Crimes
description:
This week, the gals heat things up with some unique cases. Topics include a tri-state hellhole, one occasion when you really shouldn't settle for a good deal, and some...graphic discriptions. Bust open a bottle of Winc's Restless Earth Syrah, hang on to your skull caps, and tune in for Crematory Crimes.

For a full list of show sponsors, visit www.wineandcrimepodcast.com/support
